rule_value: {"rule_id": "ml_rule_low_risk","name": "Низкий рискмошенничества","description": "Вероятность мошенничества ниже 0.45 — транзакция не фрод","model_config": {"model_name": "fraud_model_v1.pkl","input_features": ["timestamp","sender_account","receiver_account","amount","transaction_type","merchant_category","location","device_used","time_since_last_transaction","spending_deviation_score","velocity_score","geo_anomaly_score","payment_channel","ip_address","device_hash"]},"risk_range": {"min": 0.0,"max": 0.45,"max_inclusive": false}}
